query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
1 Nel mezzo del cammin di nostra vita 2 mi ritrovai per una selva oscura, 3 ché la diritta via era smarrita.
query.result:
**English:**
1 In the middle of the journey of our life 2 I found myself in a dark wood, 3 because the straight way was lost.
**Cornish:**
1 Yn kres an fordh a'gan byw 2 y'm kavos yn koedh tywyll, 3 rag an fordh onan oedh kollet.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
4 Ahi quanto a dir qual era è cosa dura 5 esta selva selvaggia e aspra e forte 6 che nel pensier rinova la paura!
7 Tant’ è amara che poco è più morte; 8 ma per trattar del ben ch’i’ vi trovai, 9 dirò de l’altre cose ch’i’ v’ho scorte.
query.result:
**English:**
4 Ah! how hard it is to tell what it was like, 5 this wild, savage and harsh forest 6 that renews fear in my thoughts!
7 It is so bitter that it is little more than death; 8 but to speak of the good that I found there, 9 I will tell of the other things that I saw there.
**Cornish:**
4 Ah! kemmys yw dywedh pyth yw 5 an wals magh, gwyls ha kalet 6 hag a wra an poyntas nowydha an ofn!
7 Kemmys yw feth na yw marow bys vyth; 8 mes rag treylya an da a gavys vy, 9 yth wra vy dywedh a'n traow erel a welys vy.
